gallery.title: LA Blueprint
gallery.copy: React-Native mobile application and JavaScript web console built for a non-profit, Project for Torture Victims; Designed to provide information, resources, and a forum to facilitate communication between staff, asylum seekers, and refugees

gallery.title: Phoenix - Pandemic Community Spread Tracker & Visualizer
gallery.copy: A pandemic community spread tracker & visualizer, with a native iOS application as a self-reporting tool, and web application as the visualization platform

gallery.title: health.ai
gallery.copy: Web and native iOS application that leverages machine learning to recommend patient tests; Winner of Most Energy Efficient/Sustainable Energy Hack at TreeHacks 2020!

gallery.title: Radius - Who's in your Circle?
gallery.copy: Location-based social media app, focused on facilitating real human connection with the people that you pass by on a day-to-day basis

gallery.title: Health on a Cloud
gallery.copy: Safety-and-security-first TeleHealth provider app packed with powerful ML analytic tools and WebSockets for live communication

gallery.title: DeepHole
gallery.copy: A crowdsourced data platform for damaged infrastructure

gallery.title: StencilMe
gallery.copy: App that uses the iOS ARKit API to display a user image on a flat surface of their choice; Winner of UCLA ACM Hack's Hacksprint iOS Winter 2019!

gallery.title: Up2Date
gallery.copy: A quick and easy way to stay up to date on relevant news

gallery.title: Sincerely, AI
gallery.copy: Deep Learning for Classification of Insincere Text

gallery.title: Gravity Fall
gallery.copy: Gravity Falls is a platform game where our main protagonists, Red and Ned, can defy gravity; Winner of Hack on the Hill V Best Game!
